author: andschwa
body:
This resolves #604, gets us to the latest .NET Core packages, and re-pins CLI to a newer, faster version.

Not merging until I add some `Add-Type` tests.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @vors @JamesWTruher We may want to merge this with the failing Windows test, as it identifies a problem we should fix in a separate PR (after integrating Source Depot changes). Sound good?

title: Bump packages and fix dependencies
